content: to red for this round you will be working over round 22 white and into round 21 blue i hope this makes sense the stitches will go over top of the white but will be worked into the stitch holes of round 21 attach red with a slip_stitch into round 21 below the first of any set of 2sc of white 33 chain 1 single_crochet into same st as chain and into the next two st slip_stitch into the next 3 st repeat this *3 single_crochet 3 slip_stitch* all the way around slip_stitch to join to the first single_crochet fo weave in ends eyes make 2 - 4 5mm hook worked in the round start with black 1 single_crochet 6 into magic_ring switch to white 2 increase around 12 3 increase single_crochet x3 around 15 4 single_crochet around 15 slip_stitch into next st fo leave long tail for sewing esca the lure 4 5mm hook worked in the round start with yellow 1 single_crochet 6 into magic_ring 2 increase around 12 3 single_crochet around 12 switch to lighter shade of blue 4 single_crochet around 12 5 decrease around 6 stuff the bulb here it will be easier before the stem is finished the stem is not stuffed 6-12 single_crochet around 6 11 half_double_crochet increase into the first 3 st single_crochet into the next 3 st 9 slip_stitch into next st fo leave tail for sewing dorsal back fin - 4 5mm hook lighter shade of blue 1 chain 15 single_crochet x14 chain 1 turn 2 single_crochet x14 chain 1 turn 3 slip_stitch into first single_crochet chain 6 slip_stitch 5 back down the chain slip_stitch into next 2 single_crochet chain 7 slip_stitch 6 back down the chain slip_stitch into next 2 single_crochet chain 8 slip_stitch 7 back down the chain slip_stitch into next 2 single_crochet chain 9 slip_stitch 8 back down the chain slip_stitch into next 2 single_crochet chain 10 slip_stitch 9 back down the chain slip_stitch into next 2 single_crochet chain 11 slip_stitch 10 back down the chain slip_stitch into next 2 single_crochet chain 7 slip_stitch 6 back down the chain slip_stitch into next single_crochet chain 4 slip_stitch 3 back down the chain slip_stitch back into same single_crochet slip_stitch down the side & fo leave a longer tail for sewing weave in the short end pectoral side fins - make 2 4 5mm hook in lighter shade of blue 1 chain 5 single_crochet 4 chain 1 turn 2 increase single_crochet x2 increase chain 1 turn 6 3 increase single_crochet x4 increase chain 1 turn 8 4 increase single_crochet x6 increase chain 1 turn 10 5 single_crochet across turn 10 6 *chain 5 slip_stitch 4 back down the chain slip_stitch into next 2 single_crochet* repeat between * * four more times after the 5th spine you will only have 1 single_crochet to slip_stitch back into then slip_stitch 5 times down the side & fo leave a tail for sewing weave in the short end caudal tail fin - 4 5mm hook
